name: Free Afternoon
description:
do you still remember floppy discs, dial phones , walkmans...

free afternoon is just what you need to deal with ancient technology

This is the post-jam version. the original submission can be downloaded below.

link to Ludum Dare 36 submission:

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-36/?action=p...

This is a Flash game, it only works in a compatible browser such as Firefox (it does not play in Chrome). Also the Flash plugin needs to be downloaded and enabled in your browser.
